title: Aram Key Drops?!
body: Hi guys, before the recent patch i used to get a lot of key fragments just by playing aram ( 3 keys per 10 game) now i have played around 30 aram games and no keys or anything dropped. Does anyone got any info on this?

replies.body: The key drop rate is not linear. everytime you get one it decreases the chances to get another one i believe
